portfolio.title: Weather App
portfolio.description: Integrated Yahoo Weather API using RapidAPI for real-time multi-city weather data with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Fetch API for async retrieval and UI design.

portfolio.title: E-Commerce Site
portfolio.description: React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS; developed a fully functional e-commerce website that allows users to browse products, add items to their cart, complete purchases, and features user authentication for seamless transactions..

portfolio.title: To-Do List App
portfolio.description: React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS; designed and developed an intuitive Todo List app for seamless task management with real-time updates and local storage, utilizing React hooks for state management and Tailwind CSS for a modern design..
